message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $13,000. I believe this price reflects the value it holds for you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I can get from the product.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the value.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?
I'm getting close to the price I'm willing to pay, but I still think $10,000 is a more reasonable price. Can we meet at $11,000?
